title: Sapphire eSports is seeking a new Junior analyst
body:
Sapphire eSports is seeking a new Junior analyst to help develop and push their competitive team to the next level. We are currently recruiting a new analyst that is wishing to develop analytical skills and learn along the way. You will work alongside experienced members to help develop your understanding of the game at a macro and micro level.

Requirements
- Able to attend several sets of scrims per week.
- Open minded and willing to learn.
- A passion for numbers and looking at LoL beyond it's playing value
- Commitment and dedication

No experience is required, but definitely helps.

If you are interested in the role, please contact "Glacial" in game to set up a trial/meeting.
